QuestData.Title: Salvaging the Remains
QuestData.Description: Forgotten Hill has been overrun with zombies and ghouls ever since we reclaimed this wretched isle. We have tried to clear them out many times but they always seem to come back.$b$bOne of our lieutenants recommended taking the ghouls' bones when we kill them in hopes that they can't reincarnate overnight. Think you can help us out with this one?
QuestData.LogDescription: You need to recover 9 Cursed Femur bones from the ghouls that inhabit Forgotten Hill. Forgotten Hill is on the west side of the island, just past The Forgotten Front.
QuestData.CompletionText: Were you able to recover the femur bones? Better for you to try than me.
QuestData.RewardText: I didn't think you would be able to do it, $n. You are just full of surprises aren't you?
